artist: Artist: Heather Watts; Publisher: Heather Watts , Halifax, Canada
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical contour drawing of house with text and designs printed in offset lithography on green wove paper covers; 41 pp.
title: On the Road From Freshwater Bridge: A History of the House at 5500 Inglis Street, Halifax
